text: Gotcha!  I’ve been writing docstrings for my functions per the style guide, and the data wrangling ones can grow enormous!

elements.text: Gotcha!  I’ve been writing docstrings for my functions per the style guide, and the data wrangling ones can grow enormous!

text: Documentation is great and can  help make your code more accessible, but also keep in mind you don't owe anyone docstrings. If it gets too onerous, you don't have to do it.

elements.text: Documentation is great and can  help make your code more accessible, but also keep in mind you don't owe anyone docstrings. If it gets too onerous, you don't have to do it.

text: Yeah, I second also the ‘self-documenting code’ idea, esp for data wrangling code. We’d get points deducted in my intro CS class for having docstrings that were longer than one or two crisp lines.

elements.text: Yeah, I second also the ‘self-documenting code’ idea, esp for data wrangling code. We’d get points deducted in my intro CS class for having docstrings that were longer than one or two crisp lines.

text: Oh man, lol, my docstrings can become a whole paragraph in places!

elements.text: Oh man, lol, my docstrings can become a whole paragraph in places!
